content:
938 If a company can’t survive without foreign labor, it should fail.

If a farm can’t survive without foreign labor, it should fail.

If a school can’t survive without foreign students, it should fail. posted 10 hours ago by PiratePatriotParrot 49 comments award share report block Bad Hombre @joma_gc • 1d If a company can’t survive without foreign labor, it should fail. If a farm can’t survive without foreign labor, it should fail. If a school can’t survive without foreign students, it should fail.
49 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save -Evspra 43 points 9 hours ago Telling Americans that they're not talented enough to work at a CAR PLANT is probably the most out of touch and insulting thing he's recently said. This is America. We voted for America FIRST. Americans FIRST. I don't believe that importing third worlders to replace Americans is MAGA. I know I didn't vote to get replaced by some Indian or Mexican, or Venezuelan, or Chinaman. I don't believe Americans should be second to foreigners. I don't believe that Americans can't be taught how to do an industrial job. I don't believe that we're "lacking talent", nor should we be able to justify importing half a million Chinese for any reason, when OUR UNEMPLOYMENT RATE IS NOW AT THE HIGHEST POINT SINCE OCTOBER, 2021. permalink award report block reply Dwoj 18 points 6 hours ago Yeah, I don’t know what’s going on with President Trump. I was really offended by that too. I don’t know why he would say shit like that. permalink parent award report block reply mohel 5 points 3 hours ago Vivek Ramswamy runs the party? permalink parent award report block reply HoodooOperator 1 points 6 hours ago Comment removed by community moderators. permalink parent award report block reply Aquamine-Amarine 12 points 7 hours ago I love shitting on schools and it's true that most people that go in come out stupider. Yet even despite that we have some smart people that went to a trade school instead and have the skills. The problem is companies discriminate against them and refuse to hire them because they're talented White men. So we have two problems: Schools are keeping students stupid and not actually teaching them anything except communism. The ones that do make it out with good skills and degrees in fields that are actually useful aren't being hired because companies refuse to hire talented White men. permalink parent award report block reply taxesaretheft 7 points 5 hours ago If a company can't survive without paying their workers a living wage, it should fail Looking at you Walmart permalink parent award report block reply AVeryNakedMan 0 points 54 minutes ago Wages should be determined by free market forces. Not by what some person thinks is a "living" wage whether that person is a worker or a politician. But naturally, if you fix dumb government policies, wages would rise anyways. permalink parent award report block reply taxesaretheft 1 points 1 minute ago Race to the bottom mentality! Why is it ok for a company to be profitable by paying their employees jack and shit? His biggest goal is to bring businesses back to America, and he’s willing to do anything, even screwing over American workers, to make that happen. So he doesn’t mind if corporations staff all of their businesses with foreigners as long as those foreigners are working in America legally where they can be taxed. permalink parent award report block reply load 11 more comments... Doesn’t work great if they replace all with foreigners.  You just get poor people and high prices nationally.  Works for the few, screws everyone else. permalink parent award report block reply Throwingway22 10 points 6 hours ago There was no concern from Washington when slave labor and off-shoring where destroying American farms and factories and other small businesses. There is an entire wasteland in CA where the once thriving flower industry, employing thousands, once thrived--we now get our flowers from Argentina. Everyone's grandparents had their house stocked with furniture built by (American) hand in NC--now it's all flatpack assembly slop from China. Small ranchers can't graze their cows because of Climate Commie regulations and they can't process their meat without paying their international conglomerate competitors who own the government authorized meat processing plants. I give zero shits for the short-term pain that it would take to save America from the parasitic globalism that is killing it. permalink award report block reply GnuYow 10 points 6 hours ago If a country can't survive without constant aid from the U.S., it should fail. permalink award report block reply pococurante 1 points 2 hours ago I'm not against some level of foreign aid if it keeps a failing country from being conquered by the evil forces of Islam. But that aid should be also require that we accept no immigrants, because that country needs its people to rebuild itself rather than flee their homeland.
